content: That's great advice on research! I've been trying to do more research for my own writing, and I think creating a research plan and organizing my notes will really help me stay on track. By the way, I've been thinking about writing a historical fiction novel set in the 1920s, and I've been reading a lot of books from that era to get a sense of the time period. Do you have any recommendations for books or resources that could help me learn more about the 1920s?
